website_summaries.verdict: Fairly affordable, protects against freezing up to -34F, and shields against rust and corrosion, we highly recommend Coolanol for smaller marine vehicles, or else using Coolanol may get expensive rather quickly.
pros: Raises cooling system’s boiling point to 265°F
cons: We wish that Coolanol was available in bottles larger than 64oz

customer_reviews.title: mY cOoLAnT
customer_reviews.text: It’s coolant, c’mon...you want good quality, and boiling-freezing point (which this is) ! It’s green and not pet friendly... so if you’re looking at reviews...U obviously keep good care of ur stuff and care. Don’t over think this, buy n use...good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: BookWorm

customer_reviews.title: GIANT product
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a HUGE container. Yes, the Coolant is good, but there is no way for one person will use this much. Still a great product and works amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Marshall

customer_reviews.title: It's coolant to your doorstep. Not much else to say.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's good but probably nothing special. Aluminum rad safe coolant sent to my door step definitely worth the money. I did not notice any difference in temperature or performance. Bike got hot just as fast as "normal" coolant and that's all.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Maxima Coolinol
customer_reviews.text: Love using Maxima Products in and on my 300 KTM, & will continue..

customer_reviews.title: Good brand
customer_reviews.text: Is good 👍 but buy this in a motorcycle shop is cheaper

customer_reviews.title: Great product I guess
customer_reviews.text: Great product I guess, I can tell my bike seems more chipper and responsive now could be in my head but it runs better. Only downfall is my bike takes 2.2 liters and they sell his in 1.869 liters and a gallon. On mine I have to buy another jug just to add a cup and let the full bottle sit.

customer_reviews.text: Used this to flush the coolant in my brute force with its aluminum VTwin
customer_reviews.author: D. McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Good for the CBR 600 F4i.
customer_reviews.text: It was just enough to fill my 2005 CBR 600 F4i radiator and a little of the reservoir. I ended up having to top off the reservoir with some distilled water.

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: I write again my review was upset because I did not receive the product when I ordered it but customer service solved my problem and sent my order again. the product is of very good quality

customer_reviews.title: I Got What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use in my 2014 VSTAR 1300 Tourer. Ingrediants fit the spec of my bike, so is what I needed. Seems a little pricey, but in the ballpark of what competing products go for.
customer_reviews.author: egroeg

customer_reviews.title: Great for sport bikes.
customer_reviews.text: Used on my 2006 GSXR-600 and has worked out very well for me. I bought 3 jugs, but only used about 1&1/4. Bike runs like a champ. Would recommend to anyone.

customer_reviews.text: Works great, trusted brand, no issues, does it's job on my 2016 Beta 300RR

customer_reviews.title: Pre-mix is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: Premix will make your life easier. Just poured it in and my bike ran cooler than ever. Great product and the price is not bad!

customer_reviews.title: Better than Blue Ice
customer_reviews.text: KDX likes this better than Ice Blue. Runs cooler for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Reedy

customer_reviews.title: Ethylene glycol based so think twice
customer_reviews.text: This product works well but does not openly state that it is ethylene glycol based- poisonous. I would recommend using propylene glycol based blue coolant like engine ice. Let’s show some love to nature and use safer products
customer_reviews.author: Kunal K.

customer_reviews.title: motorcycle anti freeze
customer_reviews.text: Have yet to use, but was glad to find motorcycle coolant that had antifreeze in it,,since I live in Indiana. Bike doesn't sit out, but you can never be to careful .

product_meta.title: Maxima 82964 Coolanol 50/50 Blend Performance Coolant - 64 oz.
product_meta.description: Size:64 OuncesMaxima Coolanol is a ready-to-use 50/50 blend of premium quality ethylene glycol based antifreeze and deionized water to provide optimum rust and corrosion protection for all aluminum and magnesium motorcycle and ATV liquid cooled engines. Coolanol also contains anti-foam agents to reduce water pump cavitation and increase cooling capacity. Coolanol 50/50 blend protects from freeze-ups in winter down to -34 Degree Fahrenheit. Coolanol also raises your cooling systems boiling point to 265 Degree Fahrenheit with a 15 pound radiator cap. This extremely low-silicate fluid is ideally suited for all motorcycle applications. Contains bittering agent.
feature_bullets: Maxima Coolanol is a ready-to-use 50/50 blend of premium quality ethylene glycol based antifreeze and deionized water to provide optimum rust and corrosion protection for all aluminum and magnesium motorcycle and ATV liquid cooled engines
Coolanol also contains anti-foam agents to reduce water pump cavitation and increase cooling capacity
Coolanol 50/50 blend protects from freeze-ups in winter down to -34 Degree Fahrenheit
Coolanol also raises your cooling systems boiling point to 265 Degree Fahrenheit with a 15 pound radiator cap
This extremely low-silicate fluid is ideally suited for all motorcycle applications
